params.implementation: Address of the governance implementation contract.
params.name: Human readable string of the name.
params.proposalThreshold: Number of votes required for creating a new proposal.
params.quorumThreshold: Number of votes required for execution.
params.timeType: Enum of time type (block number or timestamp).

GovernanceCreated(address).notice: Emitted when a governance is created.

parameters().notice: Returns the governance initialization parameters at proxy deploy.
